title: Substitution game
body:
So from time to time i get to a stage where i do not find league fun at all. And i look for a substituion game to get my mind off league and come back
Any suggestions? Free games are a preference :D

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Too much rage,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=ARBxxZhq,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2016-04-14T04:36:29.149+0000)
>
> *FREE*


>Free games are a preference

You never said that it was mandatory.

Runescape
Its free and meets your requirements

My fave at the moment is probably [Duelyst](https://duelyst.com). Free to play, strategy game. Games last less than 10 minutes, which is pretty great.

I also quite like [strife](https://strife.com), but it may be too similar to league for you (waaaay less toxic though)

Good luck with whatever you choose ♥

If you have steam you can find a whole bunch of free to play games there. Heaps of stuff is worth giving a shot like Team Fortress 2, Warframe, a million mmos and a whole bunch of shorter indie games too.
